Log1 - 24/11/2023 - author: TankadiN
--------------------------------------
Today I found this computer when taking a walk around area, it looks pretty old and has basic OS installed, which is just a simple terminal with few simple commands like in any other computers.

Though, I didn't heard about this particular os... WolfOS...
As I was storing files here and my logs, I noticed they began to encrypt (even corrupt) themselves, must be because of machine's age, I don't even wanna know how old the disk is...
Decrypting and recovering might take some time...

Looks like I can modify it to my likings so there's that, maybe this terminal will be useful to me after all...
